title: Is remote learning the future? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes may be as because of this pandemic now we are realising that there are so many works which are done remotely. Now days major of the IT companies are Working remotely. In my opinion many fields like Remote banking, finance, working, and learning through electronic devices are performing remotely. So its a big YES

Very much so especially in the world of software development. Not just because of the pandemic but because of the cost of getting everybody in one place. I’ve been teaching software development at the corporate level since 2007 and it works very well and is very successful.
